scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:content && npm run build:sandbox && npm run build:offscreen && npm run build:models
scripts.build:sandbox: npx esbuild src/sandbox/gpu-bridge.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/gpu-bridge.js --format=esm --target=esnext --minify && cp public/sandbox.html dist/sandbox.html && mkdir -p dist/assets && cp node_modules/@huggingface/transformers/dist/ort-wasm-simd-threaded.jsep.* dist/assets/ && cp node_modules/voy-search/voy_search_bg.wasm dist/assets/
scripts.build:offscreen: npx esbuild src/offscreen/offscreen.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/offscreen.js --format=esm --target=esnext --minify && cp public/offscreen.html dist/offscreen.html
scripts.build:models: [ -d public/models ] && cp -r public/models dist/ || echo 'No models to copy (run npm run download:models first)'
